venue.name: Connecticut Post Cinema 14 Rave Motion Pictures

item.description:
Come on out to see "The Hobbit" in IMAX 3D (I'm intentionally not picking the HFR 48fps format) at the Milford mall.  2hrs, 46 min.

Movie starts at 7:15.  I'm assuming this will be a busy night, so I'll be in the lobby around 6:30, and I'll head into the the theater at 6:45.  If you're running late, if you send me a text that you're coming, I'll do my best to save you a seat with us.

If anyone wants to get together before, speak up, maybe we'll setup something.  We can also hang-out afterwards.

I'll be buying my ticket in advance here:
http://www.ravemotionpictures.com/theater.aspx?id=33

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP (texting is fine too).
item.name: Fri. 12/14 - "The Hobbit" at the Milford Mall
